price: ߘߏ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߞߎߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߔߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߛߎߡߊ߫ ߘߴߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߔߐߍ߯
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
